reviews.review_msg: I WANT A REFUND. I PAY SO MUCH MONEY JUST HAVING TO TEACH MYSELF WHAT A PVALUE IS. SFU IS HORRIBLE.

The worst professor ever.  I have made so many nasty reviews but SFU has decided to take them down and not take responsibility for hiring such a horrible teacher. I rather starve myself than ever take this class. My future relies on the education that is given by SFU but this Tim guy does not help with that.

I guess my review got taken down but please if you love yourself don't take it with Tim. Ruined my GPA, my happiness, and my will to continue with school. Lectures don't teach you anything, and you teach yourself. The prof does not even have office hours and did not show up for our midterm.

His lectures are 8 minutes long and only briefly skim a few topics from each chapter of the textbook, which is 800 pages. Final is all multiple choice but has a grading scheme so that on top of not getting marks for incorrect answers marks are deducted from your correct answers for each wrong one. Class is complete bs. Do NOT take this course

Do not take this course online. You are not allowed to contact the prof and you have to go through the TA if you have any concerns. Expect to teach yourself purely from the textbook, no other course materials. No lecture slides or notes.
Terrible, do not take stats 203 online, little help and worst text book ever! The text is your only resource to teach yourself the material, I had to hire a tutor!
